author: Staff Reporter
text:
A mobile voters’ service centre was pressed into service for the benefit of voters seeking changes in their voter identity cards or seeking issue of fresh Elector’s Photo Identity Cards (EPIC) here.

The centre will provide Form 6 for name addition; Form 7 for deletion; Form 8 for change of address; and Form 001C for new EPICs in place of lost, destroyed, damaged EPICs. Voters may get avail the service on payment of Rs.25.

According to the administration, the mobile voters’ service centre will function in addition to the same service provided in the seven taluk offices, and seven Arasu Cable TV-run service centres in the district.

Earlier, the mobile voters’ service centre was flagged off by the District Election Officer and Collector C.Kathiravan.
title: Mobile voters’ service centre inaugurated
